doc.title: Pass on Conversation
doc.plot: Over time, roommates, Jerry and Kate, have developed a close yet ambiguous relationship that treads the thin line between platonic friendship and romance. Their tenuous living situation only exacerbates their inability to communicate and be vulnerable with one another about their true feelings. Due to the incapacity to cope with the uncertainty of the relationship, one of them makes a simple decision that may dismantle the friendship permanently.
